summary.para: Values that identify the class of a shader variable.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

remarks.para: The class of a shader variable is not a programming class; the class identifies the variable class such as scalar, vector, object, and so on. D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_CLASS-typed values are specified in the Class member of the structure.
